    • checkDubbed

      public void checkDubbed(@NotNull @NotNull Player player)
      This method checks if a player dubs another player, this can happen when a player moves forward or backward
      Parameters:
      player - This parameter represent the dubbed player

    • addCredits

      public void addCredits(int credits)
      This method add the points to the current points value.
      Parameters:
      credits - This is the number of point that needs to be added to the point value.
